trait.name: Confer Fire Resistance
entries: The nightmare can grant {@variantrule Resistance|XPHB} to Fire damage to a rider while it is on the nightmare.

trait.name: Illumination
entries: The nightmare sheds {@variantrule Bright Light|XPHB} in a 10-foot radius and {@variantrule Dim Light|XPHB} for an additional 10 feet.

action.name: Hooves
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 6}, reach 5 ft. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) Bludgeoning damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Fire damage.

action.name: Ethereal Stride
entries: The nightmare and up to three willing creatures within 5 feet of it teleport to the Ethereal Plane from the Material Plane or vice versa.
